How many people are affected by abetalipoproteinemia ?,Abetalipoproteinemia is a rare disorder with approximately 100 cases described worldwide.,GHR,abetalipoproteinemia
What are the genetic changes related to abetalipoproteinemia ?,"Mutations in the MTTP gene cause abetalipoproteinemia. The MTTP gene provides instructions for making a protein called microsomal triglyceride transfer protein, which is essential for creating beta-lipoproteins. These lipopr
